data.lyric:

[00:00.00]At The Club - Jacquees/Dej Loaf
[00:04.00]Written by：Rodriquez Broadnax/Deja Monet Tremble/Kharri Eugene Hunter
[00:08.00]From Detroit's west side
[00:10.27]Jacquees：
[00:10.80]Met her in the club
[00:12.42]
[00:12.96]All the ballers showing love
[00:14.85]
[00:15.65]Can you party with a thug
[00:17.53]
[00:18.24]I'm just trying to show you love
[00:20.14]
[00:20.84]VIP we got it packed
[00:22.70]
[00:23.44]This is where the party at
[00:25.27]
[00:25.87]You're the one I wanna know
[00:27.91]
[00:28.53]So tell me how it's supposed to go
[00:30.57]Dej Loaf：
[00:31.08]He said meet me in Miami
[00:33.25]Ever been on a jet girl don't you panic
[00:36.12]Get used to the whips and the mansions
[00:38.53]He ain't know I was this thick
[00:40.20]T shirt panties
[00:41.23]We hit the club together we tip the dancers
[00:43.93]Might grab a couple if they really attractive
[00:46.29]Or I can keep it classy I can get romantic
[00:49.11]It's all up to you
[00:50.59]What you wanna do
[00:51.66]Jacquees：
[00:51.96]I used to love 'em leave 'em
[00:54.35]Girl it's something about you
[00:55.67]Think I'ma keep you keep you
[00:57.14]Pull up in the Wagon I put the Jeep up Jeep up
[00:59.87]Girl we living lavish so kick your feet up feet up
[01:02.97]Met her in the club
[01:04.54]
[01:05.19]All the ballers showing love
[01:07.06]
[01:07.85]Can you party with a thug
[01:09.61]
[01:10.39]I'm just trying to show you love
[01:12.29]
[01:12.84]VIP we got it packed
[01:14.85]
[01:15.50]This is where the party at
[01:17.46]
[01:18.35]You're the one I wanna know
[01:20.14]
[01:20.73]So tell me how it's supposed to go
[01:23.31]Let's take a trip to the other side other side
[01:26.23]Tell me if you're thinking otherwise otherwise
[01:28.70]You're a boss I wanna treat you treat you
[01:31.16]I know you tired of all the leeches leeches
[01:33.79]Girl I'm in love with all your features features
[01:36.41]And I will love you til your knees weak
[01:38.84]It could be simple but it ain't easy easy
[01:41.61]I know you know what's up
[01:43.27]It's all on us
[01:44.13]Dej Loaf：
[01:44.63]I used to love 'em leave 'em
[01:46.54]Boy it's something bout you
[01:47.88]Think I'ma keep you
[01:49.26]I pull up in the Wagon I put the Jeep up
[01:51.87]Boy we living lavish kick your feet up
[01:54.10]
[01:54.82]All I wanna do
[01:57.32]Is get away with you
[01:59.72]You had me at hello what's up
[02:02.14]What we gonna do when we leave this club
[02:05.01]Jacquees：
[02:05.48]Met her in the club
[02:07.03]
[02:07.84]All the ballers showing love
[02:09.71]
[02:10.46]Can you party with a thug
[02:12.28]
[02:12.81]I'm just trying to show you love
[02:15.34]VIP we got it packed
[02:17.44]
[02:18.30]This is where the party at
[02:19.98]
[02:20.85]You're the one I wanna know
[02:22.74]
[02:23.41]So tell me how it's supposed to go
[02:25.25]DeJ Loaf：
[02:25.73]Yeah ohh yeah
data.trans:
[ti:At The Club]
[ar:Jacquees/Dej Loaf]
[al:At The Club]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.00]//
[00:08.00]我从底特律西部来
[00:10.27]//
[00:10.80]在俱乐部与她邂逅
[00:12.42]
[00:12.96]所有的狂欢者都大胆示爱
[00:14.85]
[00:15.65]你会和恶棍一起狂欢吗
[00:17.53]
[00:18.24]我只是想向你袒露心意
[00:20.14]
[00:20.84]我们是这里的会员  一切都已备全
[00:22.70]
[00:23.44]这就是派对的举办地点
[00:25.27]
[00:25.87]你就是我想了解的那个人
[00:27.91]
[00:28.53]所以 告诉我一切该如何进行下去
[00:30.57]//
[00:31.08]他说在迈阿密见过我
[00:33.25]在飞机上也见过 女孩 你是否有些恐慌
[00:36.12]习惯了纵享激情 出入高级场和
[00:38.53]他不知道 我这么丰满
[00:40.20]恤衫 女式短裤
[00:41.23]我们在俱乐部沸腾全场 气场盖过这些舞者
[00:43.93]如果他们够吸引人 我们愿意结交几个做朋友
[00:46.29]我可以保守传统 也可以浪漫奔放
[00:49.11]这都由你决定
[00:50.59]你想怎么做
[00:51.66]//
[00:51.96]我曾经爱过她们 但已离开她们
[00:54.35]女孩 这都是因为你
[00:55.67]我想我会一直把你留在身边
[00:57.14]停下货车 把吉普车装上去
[00:59.87]女孩 我们的生活多彩奢华 所以欢呼雀跃吧
[01:02.97]在俱乐部与她邂逅
[01:04.54]
[01:05.19]所有的狂欢者都大胆示爱
[01:07.06]
[01:07.85]你会和恶棍一起狂欢吗
[01:09.61]
[01:10.39]我只是想向你袒露心意
[01:12.29]
[01:12.84]我们是这里的会员  一切都已备全
[01:14.85]
[01:15.50]这就是派对的举办地点
[01:17.46]
[01:18.35]你就是我想了解的那个人
[01:20.14]
[01:20.73]所以 告诉我一切该如何进行下去
[01:23.31]让我们到另一边开启不可思议的旅行
[01:26.23]告诉我你是不是在想别人
[01:28.70]你就像是老板 我想将你服侍 将你服侍
[01:31.16]我知道你讨厌所有蛭类昆虫
[01:33.79]女孩 我爱上了你的一切
[01:36.41]我会尽情爱你 直到你精疲力竭
[01:38.84]爱情可以很简单 但也并非手到擒来
[01:41.61]我知道 你明白发生了什么
[01:43.27]一切只与我俩有关
[01:44.13]//
[01:44.63]我曾经爱过他们 但已离开他们
[01:46.54]男孩 这都是因为你
[01:47.88]我想我会把你留在身旁
[01:49.26]停下货车 把吉普车装上去
[01:51.87]男孩 我们的生活多彩奢华 所以欢呼雀跃吧
[01:54.10]
[01:54.82]我只想
[01:57.32]和你一起逃离喧嚣
[01:59.72]只一句问候你就将我俘获 到底怎么了
[02:02.14]离开俱乐部后 我们该做些什么
[02:05.01]//
[02:05.48]在俱乐部与她邂逅
[02:07.03]
[02:07.84]所有的狂欢者都大胆示爱
[02:09.71]
[02:10.46]你会和恶棍一起狂欢吗
[02:12.28]
[02:12.81]我只是想向你袒露心意
[02:15.34]我们是这里的会员  一切都已备全
[02:17.44]
[02:18.30]这就是派对的举办地点
[02:19.98]
[02:20.85]你就是我想了解的那个人
[02:22.74]
[02:23.41]所以 告诉我一切该如何进行下去
